attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous
attributes.review: Why, just why would this be made a reality 2020 is already bad enough but nooo just one more thing had to happen...

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: the app straight up download all of p***hubs content onto my phone and photoshopped Joe Biden and Hillary Clinton onto the actors instead. I don’t know what the purpose of this app is but I did not think it was that!

attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE !!
attributes.review: i was here to support are non-racist, non-homophobic , and amazing president . and i was so wrong 😞 , instead i found a piece of orange chicken with a wig on . oh well barak obama where you at we need you to save the world !

attributes.title: Worst app on here
attributes.review: Soo bad. Stops working after like 5 minutes. The news are inaccurate. So disappointed

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I’m truly disgusted within this app. Who genuinely made this? It’s horrible. I’m disgusted. I just want to support trump but it’s so hard when he can’t even make decent app. Pathetic.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: If I could give this zero stars I would. This app took two months to download. It hacked all my personal pictures and messages. It has made my phone run slower. WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: Malicious software designed to hack your phone. Provides the trump campaign with illegally recovered personal data. Rips off trademarks and copyrights of Twitter, TikTok, Facebook and many other platforms.

attributes.title: DISGUSTJNG
attributes.review: This app does nothing and will never be anything no matter what coding you try. Trash app. Don’t download it told me to cut my grass with my teeth 0/10 you dont get my vote this tjme trump be better.

attributes.title: Very bad and nastyyyy❌❌
attributes.review: So once I downloaded the app the screen just went weird and it was crazy like someone hacked my phone so did app is cancelled periodttt💯💯

attributes.title: A FALURE TO SOCIETY
attributes.review: it’s steals your data and sells your information along with it giving out your phone number and overheats your phone. Horrible just like the president.
